sqlQuery.name: SNP
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT nal.start_min, chr.source_id chromosome, if.source_id snp_id, etn.source_id source_id, if.allele, case when if.allele = snp.major_allele then '' || if.allele || '' else if.allele end colored_allele, snp.major_allele, snp.minor_allele, etn.project_id FROM ApidbTuning.PopsetAttributes etn, DoTS.IsolateFeature if, DoTS.IsolateSource src, DoTS.ExternalNASequence chr, DoTS.NALocation nal, ( SELECT source_id, major_allele, minor_allele FROM DoTS.SNPFeature ) snp WHERE etn.na_sequence_id = src.na_sequence_id AND src.na_feature_id = if.parent_id AND nal.na_feature_id = if.na_feature_id AND chr.na_sequence_id = if.na_sequence_id AND snp.source_id = if.source_id ORDER BY if.source_id

sqlQuery.name: RFLPgenotype
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct f.prediction_number as genotype, s.source_id,'ToxoDB' as project_id from dots.NASequence s, dots.IsolateFeature f where f.na_sequence_id = s.na_sequence_id

sqlQuery.name: RFLPdata
sqlQuery.sql: select s.source_id,'ToxoDB' as project_id,f.product as locus,f.gene_type as type from dots.nasequence s, dots.ISOLATEFEATURE f where f.na_sequence_id = s.na_sequence_id

sqlQuery.name: BioMaterialCharacteristics
sqlQuery.sql: select ia.source_id, ia.project_id, oe.category as parent, oe.value as term, bc.value as value from APIDBTUNING.popsetattributes ia, STUDY.biomaterialcharacteristic bc, study.ontologyentry oe where ia.bio_material_id = bc.bio_material_id and bc.ontology_entry_id = oe.ontology_entry_id

sqlQuery.name: GeneOverlap
sqlQuery.sql: select sim.*, gene.gene, gene.gene_product, lower(sim.project_id) as lc_project_id from ((select i.source_id, i.project_id, s.pvalue_mant , s.pvalue_exp, tn.name as organism, org.public_abbrev as org_abbrev, s.min_subject_start as start_min, s.max_subject_end as end_max, nas.source_id as sequence_source_id from dots.similarity s, ApidbTuning.PopsetAttributes i, dots.nasequence nas, sres.taxonname tn, apidb.organism org where s.query_id = i.na_sequence_id and nas.na_sequence_id = s.subject_id and s.subject_table_id = (select table_id from core.TableInfo where name = 'ExternalNASequence') and s.subject_table_id = s.query_table_id and tn.taxon_id = nas.taxon_id and tn.taxon_id = org.taxon_id and tn.name_class = 'scientific name' ) sim left join (select g.source_id as gene, g.product as gene_product, loc.sequence_source_id, loc.start_min, loc.end_max from webready.GeneAttributes g, apidb.FeatureLocation loc where g.na_feature_id = loc.na_feature_id and loc.feature_type = 'GeneFeature' ) gene on gene.sequence_source_id = sim.sequence_source_id and gene.start_min <= sim.end_max and gene.end_max >= sim.start_min) where pvalue_exp <= &&pvalueCutoff&& order by sim.pvalue_exp, pvalue_mant

sqlQuery.name: organism
sqlQuery.sql: select ia.source_id, ia.project_id, ia.organism from ApidbTuning.PopsetAttributes ia

sqlQuery.name: description
sqlQuery.sql: select ia.source_id, ia.project_id, ia.description from ApidbTuning.PopsetAttributes ia

sqlQuery.name: product
sqlQuery.sql: select ia.source_id, ia.project_id, ia.product from ApidbTuning.PopsetAttributes ia

sqlQuery.name: strain
sqlQuery.sql: select ia.source_id, ia.project_id, ia.strain from ApidbTuning.PopsetAttributes ia

sqlQuery.name: host
sqlQuery.sql: select ia.source_id, ia.project_id, ia.host from ApidbTuning.PopsetAttributes ia

sqlQuery.name: note
sqlQuery.sql: select ia.source_id, ia.project_id, ia.note from ApidbTuning.PopsetAttributes ia

sqlQuery.name: isolation_source
sqlQuery.sql: select ia.source_id, ia.project_id, ia.isolation_source from ApidbTuning.PopsetAttributes ia

sqlQuery.name: geographic_location
sqlQuery.sql: select ia.source_id, ia.project_id, ia.geographic_location from ApidbTuning.PopsetAttributes ia

sqlQuery.name: Reference
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct ia.source_id, ref.title, ref.authors, ref.publication as journal, ia.project_id, CASE WHEN title IS NULL then 'N/A' WHEN title = 'Direct Submission' then 'N/A' ELSE 'view' end AS studyLink FROM ApidbTuning.PopsetAttributes ia, Study.StudyLink sl, Study.StudyBibRef bib, sres.BibliographicReference ref WHERE ia.protocol_app_node_id = sl.protocol_app_node_id AND sl.study_id = bib.study_id AND bib.bibliographic_reference_id = ref.bibliographic_reference_id

sqlQuery.name: AllResults
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT c.source_id, c.project_id, c.wdk_weight FROM $$popset_answer$$ c

sqlQuery.name: ApiProjectPopset
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT c.source_id, c.project_id, c.wdk_weight FROM $$popset_answer$$ c, ApidbTuning.PopsetAttributes ia where ia.source_id = c.source_id and ia.project_id = $$Project$$

sqlQuery.name: AllPopsetRecords
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT sa.source_id, sa.project_id FROM ApidbTuning.PopsetAttributes sa
